pageContext.claim: “Our consumers are rich. I gave a tremendous tax cut, and they're loaded up with money. They're buying. I saw the Wal-Mart numbers; they were through the roof, just two days ago. That's better than any poll.”
pageContext.analysis: Inflation is low this year, but wage growth has been stagnant and many economists say Trump's tariffs have raised prices for U.S. consumers.
